====Usage notes====
* When used as an adverb, Min Nan {{lang|zh|按呢}} corresponds to Mandarin {{zh-l|這麼|in this way}}, but more in the sense of Mandarin {{zh-l|如此|like this}}.  As such, Min Nan {{lang|zh|按呢}} can be placed at the end of a phrase, as can Mandarin {{lang|zh|如此}}, whereas Mandarin {{lang|zh|這麼／这么}} must be followed by an adjective or verb.

====Synonyms====
* {{qualifier|Mandarin}} {{zh-l|這麼|in this way}}, {{zh-l|如此|like this}}
